main event: An unidentified flying object was reported on 7 May 1948 at the Yugoslav-Greek border, possibly a meteor.
interesting points: The report indicates limited information available for conclusions about the sighting., The date of the incident is noted as 7 May 1948., The location of the sighting is the Lake Doiran area on the Yligo-Greek border., It is mentioned that there are no photographs associated with the incident., The official evaluation classifies the sighting under astronomical phenomena.
sighted object: unknown flying object possibly identified as a meteor
witness description: No specific witness descriptions available due to minimal information in the report.
